name: Close the divs
description:
My friend is a new front-end dev and has a nasty habit of not closing his `
`s. We need a function to close all the divs in the html he's created. Nested divs do not need to be handled. *Note:* Input might not have an even number of divs. ### Example 1 ```

hello

world
``` => ```

hello

world
``` ### Example 2 ```
``` => ```
``` ### Example 3 ```
text

``` => ```
text

```
